txt.en:
'You'll want to look for swamp cabbages, just to the west of Snowbourn, by the river. I do not know what special properties this sort of cabbage possesses, but my father always swore by its use as a remedy for drunkenness.

'You'll just smear the cabbage leaves on your friend's forehead.

'That will not be a problem, will it?'
What sort of cabbage, did you say?
